data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Saint-Benoît, Reunion to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Benoît, Reunion
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saint-Benoît.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 14 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Saint-Benoît do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Saint-Benoît, Reunion.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sainte-Rose
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sainte-Rose, Saint-Benoît, Reunion.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Saint-Benoît unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, grace the churches in Saint-Benoît, Reunion with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint-Benoît, Reunion has a population of 794,100.

We estimate Saint-Benoît has 54,133 people who might know Jesus, 629,843 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 110,124 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Saint-Benoît, Reunion.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
